Label: Higher latitude chain (Lat 61.2, Long 314.6), Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field at Narsarsuaq, Greenland, 20 sec, THEMIS GBO network - Hans Gleisner (DMI, Denmark)

VariableDescription.Name: thg_mag_nrsq
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Magnetic field B in HEZ vector components
